review: Absolutely love my new fire tv stick. I have not had any issues or problems with it, couldn't be happier
author: Ria Renee Rikard

review: I really like the Fire TV Stick. It is way better than the chrome stick. I returned the chrome months before I tried the Fire Stick.
author: jholst

review: Good streaming media player.  It was easy to set up and meets my expections.
author: Mitchell Kerr

review: Could not be happier with this product. It delivers on what it says it will, and is high quality. Keep it up
author: coachshawks

review: Love watching prime video on the big screen.
author: Denise K. Jankas "book bug"

review: It spends so much time buffering, I lose the plot of the story. Netflix is MUCH better.
author: Mary R. Taylor

review: So far my family is liking this :) we have only had it for about 2 weeks and played with it a few times.
author: Maria

review: This thing kind of sucks. The wifi signal goes in and out leaving me to assume that it has a weak wifi radio and must be 2 feet from the router... Except the router and tv are in two separate rooms. I've had nothing but issues since I've had it.
author: Kenneth Andrews
